title: Trump's travel ban and how ordinary people become monsters
text: I am a retired Customs and Border Protection officer who worked at BWI Airport for 30 years. During that time we had strict guidelines on how to treat people in our custody with respect. We also had separate guidelines on the treatment of minors, with emphasis on their age and family.
summary:
